synopsis.text: WWWAâ€™s notorious duo, Kei and Yuri, also known as the Dirty Pair, are back in action with a double assignment from the 3WA's Central Computer. A seemingly routine investigation into a space liner explosion that claimed three hundred lives takes an unexpected turn when no one comes forward to claim the insurance money. Meanwhile, the pair is also tasked with locating a missing scientist and his family. As Kei and Yuri navigate through a web of deceit and danger, they begin to suspect that the two cases might be intertwined. With the clock ticking and lives hanging in the balance, the Dirty Pair must unravel the mystery before it's too late. But can they solve the puzzle while dodging the numerous attempts on their lives? Only time will tell in this thrilling, action-packed adventure that promises to keep you on the edge of your seat!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
